RecommendationRequestContext.description:
Context that defines the page requesting recommendations
i.e. for search pages, the query/filters. for entity pages, the entity urn and tab

scenario.description: Scenario in which the recommendations will be displayed

searchRequestContext.description: Additional context for defining the search page requesting recommendations

entityRequestContext.description: Additional context for defining the entity page requesting recommendations

ScenarioType.description: Type of the scenario requesting recommendation

SearchRequestContext.description: Context that defines a search page requesting recommendations

Criterion.description: A criterion for matching a field with given value

field.description: The name of the field that the criterion refers to

value.description: The value of the intended field

values.description:
Values. one of which the intended field should match
Note, if values is set, the above "value" field will be ignored

condition.description: The condition for the criterion, e.g. EQUAL, START_WITH

negated.description: Whether the condition should be negated

Condition.description: The matching condition in a filter criterion

EntityRequestContext.description: Context that defines an entity page requesting recommendations

type.description: Type of the entity being displayed

urn.description: Urn of the entity being displayed
